SGActive is an app that allows you and your group to train together and keep leaderboards.
Checkin whenever you ride or cycle. You can also create groups and invite others to join your group.

Looking for a pickleball club near you? Maybe a swing coach to improve your game? Maybe you’re new to the city and want to join a volleyball league. Reclub is the app that’s powering the global sports community.

Use Reclub to:

DISCOVER. Find sports near you. Pick your city + sport to find other players who love the game as much as you do.
MEET. Make an activity. Play a round robin. Invite your friends to come to the court and join the fun.
RUN A CLUB. Club management made easy. Round robins, leagues and social drop-ins, all done in a few taps.
COMPETE. Setup pickleball tournaments. football competitions, or any other sport in a snap. Brackets, leagues and registration all in one place.
CHAT. Connect with the other athletes. Setup a drop-in with club members.

Terms of service: https://reclub.co/terms-of-service
Privacy policy: https://reclub.co/privacy

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

Cricbuzz - Experience cricket like never before with World’s no.1 Cricket app. Get extensive coverage of all International cricket, ICC World Cup, IPL, BBL, CPL, PSL, T20 Blast, domestic cricket and hundreds of cricket tournaments across the world.

* Fast Scores & Commentary: Stay updated with super-fast scores and immersive ball-by-ball commentary.
* Live Streaming of IPL, World Cup & More: Enjoy live streaming of IPL, World Cup, India and Australia Home Series, BBL, PSL, and other international cricket matches for an immersive viewing experience. [Available in select countries only. Not available in India]
* Live Match Notifications: Never miss a moment with live match alerts and breaking news.
* Latest News & Editorials: Stay informed with the latest updates and insightful editorials.
* Exclusive Premium Content: Get access to premium editorials and original video content with a subscription
* Upcoming Match Schedules: Plan your viewing effortlessly with upcoming match schedules.
* Rankings, Stats & Records: Explore cricket's intricacies with comprehensive data at your fingertips.
* Special content for major tournaments like ICC Cricket World Cup, T20 World Cup, IPL, Champions Trophy, WPL etc.,

Whether you are a seasoned follower of the game or a new fan Cricbuzz app has you covered.

Terms of Use - https://www.cricbuzz.com/info/termsofuse
Privacy Policy - https://www.cricbuzz.com/info/privacy

CricHeroes is the ultimate cricket scoring app to digitally score your local cricket matches, live stream them, and organise tournaments like a professional.
Join millions of passionate cricketers using the #1 Cricket Scorer App to make grassroots cricket world-class!

Live Scoring & Match Analytics:
Broadcast your live cricket scores ball by ball and get an international-grade scorecard — completely FREE!
Enjoy detailed cricket analytics like Wagon Wheel, Manhattan, Worm, Run Rate, MVP, and more.
Let your friends and family follow live scores, commentary, and full scorecards in real time.

Live Streaming & AI Highlights:
Live stream your matches and tournaments just like professional games using only a mobile phone or tools like OBS, VMix, or other broadcast software.
Get automatic AI-generated highlights of your matches after every game.
Relive your best cricket moments and share them instantly with your friends, teammates, and followers.

Your Cricket Profile & Recognition:
Build your world-class cricket profile with in-depth batting and bowling stats — just like the pros!
Earn badges, awards, and leaderboard rankings for your on-field achievements.  Check your and your team’s ranking in city, state, and national leaderboards and celebrate top performers in your area.  CricHeroes Awards – The only global grassroots cricket awards! Perform consistently to win one.

Use CricInsights to analyse performances, track your form, understand your strengths, and improve your game.

Find & Connect with the Cricket Community:
Find cricket teams, opponents, players, umpires, and grounds easily for your next match.
Find Cricketers – Discover players from your contacts and follow their journey. Cheer for them, and celebrate their top performances.
Smart Search – Search players, tournaments, teams, clubs, grounds, and academies using voice search.

For Tournament Organisers:
Run your cricket tournaments professionally and completely FREE with CricHeroes!
Create a beautiful tournament page with leaderboard, points table, schedule, boundary tracker, and live scoring.
Smart Auto-Schedule Generator – Generate tournament fixtures in seconds.  Smart NRR Calculator – Know exactly what your team needs to reach the next stage.

CricHeroes Store:
Buy exclusive CricHeroes-branded cricket apparel and gear at unbeatable prices.  Get premium-quality products trusted by players worldwide.

Cricket Feed & Community:
Stay connected with the world of cricket! Read about rules, education, trivia, quizzes, polls, and stories — all in one place.
Register as a scorer, umpire, or commentator and get more match opportunities in your area.  PRO Club – An exclusive community for CricHeroes PRO users to connect, share, and grow together.

Cricket Associations:
Follow official matches and tournaments of 50+ ICC Associations and 23+ BCCI State Associations.
Track the journey of aspiring cricketers and appreciate grassroots cricket talent.

CricHeroes is built by passionate cricketers, for cricketers and fans around the world.
With 40M+ users, 10M+ matches scored, and a 4.7+ rating, CricHeroes is the No. 1 FREE Cricket Scoring App globally.

Let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.

Eternity is an advanced esports app that offers a comprehensive platform for gamers, enthusiasts, and professionals to connect, compete, and stay informed about the latest news, tournaments, and gameplay strategies.

JomRun is Southeast Asia’s leading running app. Users can browse through more than 1000 running events in Southeast Asia and register with 0 admin fees!

You can also track your own running session and earn points to redeem vouchers and free gifts!

JomRun combines tech with running, providing you with the most convenient way to search and join a running event!

Users can pay using:
Malaysia- Grabpay, Boost e-wallet, online banking, VISA/ Mastercard, Sarawakpay
Indonesia-Gopay, ATM banking

The App integrate with HealthKit enable you to track your steps data and and earn points that you can redeem for attractive offers in Malaysia.

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物
developer: Shanghai Dewu Information Group Co., Ltd.
description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/terms-of-use
Subscription terms and conditions: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Cricket Australia Live is your No.1 destination for live cricket scores, match coverage, breaking news, video highlights and in-depth feature stories.

Features:
• Live cricket scores, stats, ladders, fixtures and more
• Live streaming of Australia Men’s and Women’s international matches played in Australia *
• Live streaming of the KFC BBL and Weber WBBL*
• BBL and WBBL ladders and fixtures
• Free live streaming of all Australian domestic cricket matches**
• Free radio streaming for international and Big Bash matches played in Australia
• Video highlights of all the action including wicket replays in our match centre ***
• Breaking cricket news from Australia and around the world
• Exclusive behind-the-scenes content from on the road with the Australian Cricket Teams
• Inside access to the game’s biggest stars
• Chromecast and AirPlay available on all videos
• Enhanced Matchday experience to help you get the most out of your day at the cricket
 
We recommend streaming over a wi-fi network when possible as additional data charges may apply from your mobile or internet provider.
 
* Kayo account required to access streaming service, provided by Foxtel.
** Marsh Sheffield Shield, WNCL, Marsh One-Day Cup
*** Only available for matches played in Australia
 
For support please contact: https://support.cricket.com.au/

Cricket Australia Privacy Policy: https://www.cricket.com.au/privacy

Singapore’s premier indoor-sheltered pickleball destination. The Performance Pickleball app brings you seamless access to court bookings, top-tier programs, and an unbeatable playing experience—all in one place.

Train like a pro – Join expert-led programs, clinics, and demo sessions tailored for every level.

Experience the thrill of Formula 1® with F1 TV Access. Relive race archives, enjoy exclusive shows, and dive into detailed data, all from your favorite devices.

With F1 TV Access, you can:
•        Get full exclusive access to Live Timing Data, Maps and Analysis
•        Watch F1 shows and documentaries
•        Explore over 2000 hours of historic race archives
•        Enjoy a premium ad-free experience 

For more information on F1 TV content available in your country please visit the F1 website.

For help with F1TV, please visit: https://support.f1.tv/s/?language=en_US

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/f1-apps-terms-of-use
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

Watching esports live has become a fad in this generation of gaming, live gaming, and live streaming. But, at some point in their lives, every gamer has considered game streaming.

So who doesn't love live gaming? If you are into gaming, you probably have thought of streaming your game to a platform. Ever wondered how popular streamers can play and stream simultaneously?

There are plenty of live streaming applications available, and some do require a premium membership to stream your game.

- Live streaming your games

About Rooter:

Rooter is India’s fastest growing gaming app with a family of more than 25M users - Watch live gaming sessions, Stream games and win your favourite characters, skins and much more - absolutely free!

Top Features:- 

Stream games anytime, anywhere!
Stream your favourite games like Among Us, Battlegrounds Mobile India BGMI, PUBG Mobile, Call of Duty Mobile CODM, PUBG New state, Free Fire, Fortnite, Brawl Stars, Clash of Clans, eFootball, Mobile Legends, Clash Royale, FIFA, GTA, Minecraft, Roblox, Chess, Skribble, Ludo etc. all at the same time absolutely free! Squad Play - Add your squad to your Live stream

Earn recurring income as a Creator
If casual gaming is your thing? We’ve got you covered. Stream your favourite games, showcase your skills and monetize exclusive content. Use the power of your community to build a regular income stream.

Create high-quality live streams
Full HD, high-resolution 1080p stream quality

Free rewards for all
Yes, you heard it right. You can get free BGMI and Free Fire rewards, characters, and much more for FREE by redeeming your Rooter coins for the rewards of your choice. It’s really as simple as that!

The Subway Maxim Cup is a series of 7-a-side international youth football tournaments in Malaysia.

Started in 2016 with the Kuala Lumpur Cup, the series has welcomed over 1,000 teams from 15 different countries. In 2024, the series expanded to include events in Johor, Penang and Langkawi alongside the flagship Kuala Lumpur tournament.

The Maxim Cup app brings together fixtures, results, galleries and more from all Series tournaments and is your go-to resource for Malaysia's top youth football events.

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB

What is Fantasy Cricket?
Fantasy Cricket is a game of skill where you create your fantasy team of 11 real players. Score points based on on-field performance. Pick your captain and vice captain, and rise up the leaderboard.

Features You’ll Love
Flex Leagues: An all new fantasy format where you decide how the game is played. Make custom leagues with your own rules and play with friends. 
Backups: Now replace unannounced players and always stay prepared for the fantasy cricket or sports game.

Why Choose Dream11?

Don’t just watch cricket—live it with our fantasy sports app. Every run, wicket and boundary becomes more thrilling when you create your fantasy team and compete with millions of passionate fans.

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.
